appearances.title: House Democrats Hold News Conference After Passage of ACA Tax Credits : CSPAN2 : January 8, 2026 5:31pm-5:48pm EST
appearances.snippet: for the leadership of pete aguilar frank pallone and every single house democrats including lauren underwood who's been a steadfast leader and supporter of the affordable care act tax credits. which are all about protecting the health care working-class americans, middle-class americans in every day americans. that's what house democrats will always be about. i'm thankful for the leadership of senator chuck schumer and every single senate democrat who in december supported legislation for a straightforward three-year extension of the affordable care act tax credit and we know that legislation has the majority of support in the united states senate right now. every single senate democrat at least four senate republicans. john thune needs to bring the bill up for a vote immediately and stop playing procedural games. they are jeopardizing the health and safety and well-being of the american people. it's now my honor to you to whip catherine clarke. >> thank you so much mr. leader and topping off my list of gratitude is to you and for your incredible leadership and strength and perseverance. i w

appearances.title: House Democratic Leaders Hold Briefing on Legislative Agenda : CSPAN : January 8, 2026 3:54am-4:22am EST
appearances.snippet: but i want to give leader jeffries and it's lauren underwood's, you know, bill and all of the members involved a big, you know, note of appreciation for the work that they're doing to get this bill. so we'll get this off of the house floor if the republicans stay true to their word. and we look forward to passing that in a bipartisan way. we'll get it off of the house floor and we'll send it over to the senate, and we'll see. they're having, as you all have been reporting, they're having active conversations about what that could look like moving forward. we're aware. we're mindful. we're keeping an eye on what that looks like, and we just want to deliver help for the american public and we hope that -- we hope that we can do this with the affordable care act tax credits, reopening the enrollment period, and allowing people who have lapsed in that coverage to join back in would be a huge benefit to our communities and the american people. thank you. you can raise it after
